column4: Can I safely use aptitude to do what  apt-get upgrade does? Because I'd like to selecitvly pick packages one by one
What do I have to do in aptitude so that this happens?
well apt-get invokes aptitude thats why its the same concept. beyond that im not entirely sure what you would need to go from there. i dontuually use the aptitude gui.
Thanks, but I need to know
let me open aptitude real quich and take a looksee
I found a setting "automatically upgrate installed packages" in the preferences
what happens when you select it?
apt-get upgrade also doesn't do anything!
FYI I'm still in a chroot
